TextBlock.Text: Solara: We're quite fortunate to have found you! Next time you find something, please, please, please come back and tell someone about where you plan to go.
Lotus: I mean, Kestrel told me to --
Kestrel: Anyways, what exactly is this place? Did we get transported to another planet?
Lotus: Not exactly. It seems that whatever life forms that were here before us were able to find a way to manipulate the <color=orange>4th Dimension</color>.
Kestrel: That's time, right? So are we actually on the same planet in the future?
Solara: No, that's a common misconception. I suppose the tesseract on the interior caused this? As well as making the giant structure above us appear?
Lotus: That's the theory I'm going with, but I have yet to fully explore this "side" of the planet.
